description: Fixed point of "k -> k/2 or (k+1)/2 until result is prime", starting with prime(n)+1.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a039641 = until ((== 1) . a010051) (flip div 2 . (+ 1)) . (+ 1) . a000040-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 17 2013
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
